data.comment: The match is underway. Sheffield Wed have kicked-off.
Tyreeq Bakinson (Bristol City) has received a yellow card from Tony Harrington.
In the minute 44, At Ashton Gate, Jamie Paterson has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The first-half has come to a close in Bristol.
Bristol City kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 60, Tommy Rowe puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Garry Monk (Sheffield Wed) is making a first substitution, with Fisayo Dele-Bashiru replacing Isaiah Brown.
Kadeem Harris (Sheffield Wed) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 74, The away team replace Elias Kachunga with Adam Reach.
Antoine Semenyo is replacing Nahki Wells for Bristol City at Ashton Gate.
Jordan Rhodes is replacing Liam Palmer for the away team.
In the minute 89, Bristol City make their second substitution with Famara Diedhiou replacing Chris Martin.
The match has come to a close in Bristol. The final score is 2-0.
Steven Sessegnon is on a sub for Jack Hunt for Bristol City.
Goal! Bristol City extend their lead to 2-0 through Jamie Paterson.
